          -Merge-Request-91 Hotlist-Merge-Review Merge-Review-91
          
          <br>
        <!---->
        
      </div><br>
    
        
      
        This bug requires manual review: Request affecting a post-stable build<span class="line"><!---->This bug requires manual review: Request affecting a post-stable build<!----></span><br>Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<!----></span><br><br>1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<span class="line"><!---->1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<!----></span><br>- Chrome: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome: <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<!----></a><br>- Chrome OS: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome OS: <!----></span>https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines"><!---->https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<!----></a><br>2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<span class="line"><!---->2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<!----></span><br>3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span><br>4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<span class="line"><!---->4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<!----></span><br>5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<span class="line"><!---->5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<!----></span><br>6. Is this a new feature?<span class="line"><!---->6. Is this a new feature?<!----></span><br>7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<span class="line"><!---->7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<!----></span><br><br>Chrome OS Only:<span class="line"><!---->Chrome OS Only:<!----></span><br>8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <span class="line"><!---->8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <!----></span>http://go/cros-engprodcomponents<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://go/cros-engprodcomponents"><!---->http://go/cros-engprodcomponents<!----></a><br><br>Please contact the milestone owner if you have questions.<span class="line"><!---->Please contact the milestone owner if you have questions.<!----></span><br>Owners: benmason@(Android), bindusuvarna@(iOS), marinakz@(ChromeOS), pbommana@(Desktop)<span class="line"><!---->Owners: benmason@(Android), bindusuvarna@(iOS), marinakz@(ChromeOS), pbommana@(Desktop)<!----></span><br><br>For more details visit <span class="line"><!---->For more details visit <!----></span>https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage"><!---->https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<!----></a> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<span class="line"><!----> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7"><!---->18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7<!----></a><br>Author: Muyao Xu <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Muyao Xu &lt;<!----></span>muyaoxu@google.com<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/muyaoxu@google.com"><!---->muyaoxu@google.com<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Wed May 26 23:56:47 2021<span class="line"><!---->Date: Wed May 26 23:56:47 2021<!----></span><br><br>[Zenith] Delete dummy notifications after the web page is closed<span class="line"><!---->[Zenith] Delete dummy notifications after the web page is closed<!----></span><br><br>A dummy notification should be removed from the Zenith dialog when the<span class="line"><!---->A dummy notification should be removed from the Zenith dialog when the<!----></span><br>web page that's associated with the notification is closed or lost<span class="line"><!---->web page that's associated with the notification is closed or lost<!----></span><br>focus. This matches what Cast dialog is doing.<span class="line"><!---->focus. This matches what Cast dialog is doing.<!----></span><br><br>This CL makes the PresentationRequestNotificationProducer own an<span class="line"><!---->This CL makes the PresentationRequestNotificationProducer own an<!----></span><br>observer to the WebContents, which hides the dummy notification when<span class="line"><!---->observer to the WebContents, which hides the dummy notification when<!----></span><br>the WebContents is destroyed or lost focus.<span class="line"><!---->the WebContents is destroyed or lost focus.<!----></span><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit <!----></span>8f7f373eae000caeafabe17ceee433469b291767<a class="undefined" target="_blank"         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion.       Chrome Version: 92.0.4504.0 (Official Build) canary (x86_64)<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: 92.0.4504.0 (Official Build) canary (x86_64)<!----></span><br>Operating System: MacOS<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: MacOS<!----></span><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br><br>1. out/asan/chrome --enable-features=GlobalMediaControlsCastStartStop --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "about:blank" "<span class="line"><!---->1. out/asan/chrome --enable-features=GlobalMediaControlsCastStartStop --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "about:blank" "<!----></span>http://localhost:8000/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://localhost:8000/poc.html"><!---->http://localhost:8000/poc.html<!----></a>"<span class="line"><!---->"<!----></span><br>2. In <span class="line"><!---->2. In <!----></span>http://localhost:8000/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://localhost:8000/poc.html"><!---->http://localhost:8000/poc.html<!----></a> click on the button and wait for "<span class="line"><!----> click on the button and wait for "<!----></span>http://localhost:8000/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://localhost:8000/poc.html"><!---->http://localhost:8000/poc.html<!----></a>"<span class="line"><!---->"<!----></span> tab to close<span class="line"><!----> tab to close<!----></span><br>3. On the Zenith dialog try to turn on the live caption<span class="line"><!---->3. This matches what Cast dialog is doing.<span class="line"><!---->focus. PresentationRequestNotificationProducer own an<!----></span><br>observer to the WebContents, which hides the dummy notification when<span class="line"><!---->observer to the WebContents, which hides the dummy notification when<!----></span><br>the WebContents is destroyed or lost focus.<span class="line"><!---->the WebContents is destroyed or lost focus.<!----></span><br><br>Bug:<span         This bug requires manual review: Request affecting a post-stable build<span class="line"><!---->This bug requires manual review: Request affecting a post-stable build<!----></span><br>Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<!----></span><br><br>1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<span class="line"><!---->1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<!----></span><br>- Chrome: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome: <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<!----></a><br>- Chrome OS: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome OS: <!----></span>https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines"><!---->https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<!----></a><br>2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<span class="line"><!---->2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<!----></span><br>3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span><br>4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<span class="line"><!---->4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<!----></span><br>5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<span class="line"><!---->5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<!----></span><br>6. Is this a new feature?<span class="line"><!---->6. Is this a new feature?<!----></span><br>7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<span class="line"><!---->7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<!----></span><br><br>Chrome OS Only:<span class="line"><!---->Chrome OS Only:<!----></span><br>8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <span class="line"><!---->8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <!----></span>http://go/cros-engprodcomponents<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://go/cros-engprodcomponents"><!---->http://go/cros-engprodcomponents<!----></a><br><br>Please contact the milestone owner if you have questions.<span class="line"><!---->Please contact the milestone owner if you have questions.<!----></span><br>Owners: benmason@(Android), bindusuvarna@(iOS), marinakz@(ChromeOS), pbommana@(Desktop)<span class="line"><!---->Owners: benmason@(Android), bindusuvarna@(iOS), marinakz@(ChromeOS), pbommana@(Desktop)<!----></span><br><br>For more details visit <span class="line"><!---->For more details visit <!----></span>https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage"><!---->https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<!----></a> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<span class="line"><!----> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7"><!---->18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7<!----></a><br>Author: Muyao Xu <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Muyao Xu &lt;<!----></span>muyaoxu@google.com<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/muyaoxu@google.com"><!---->muyaoxu@google.com<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Wed May 26 23:56:47 2021<span class="line"><!---->Date: Wed May 26 23:56:47 2021<!----></span><br><br>[Zenith] Delete dummy notifications after the web page is closed<span class="line"><!---->[Zenith] Delete dummy notifications after the web page is closed<!----></span><br><br>A dummy notification should be removed from the Zenith dialog when the<span class="line"><!---->A dummy notification should be removed from the Zenith dialog when the<!----></span><br>web page that's associated with the notification is closed or lost<span class="line"><!---->web page that's associated with the notification is closed or lost<!----></span><br>focus. This matches what Cast dialog is doing.<span class="line"><!---->focus.         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. This matches what Cast dialog is doing.<span class="line"><!---->focus. PresentationRequestNotificationProducer own an<!----></span><br>observer to the WebContents, which hides the dummy notification when<span class="line"><!---->observer to the WebContents, which hides         This bug requires manual review: Request affecting a post-stable build<span class="line"><!---->This bug requires manual review: Request affecting a post-stable build<!----></span><br>Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<!----></span><br><br>1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<span class="line"><!---->1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<!----></span><br>- Chrome: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome: <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<!----></a><br>- Chrome OS: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome OS: <!----></span>https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines"><!---->https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<!----></a><br>2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<span class="line"><!---->2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<!----></span><br>3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span><br>4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<span class="line"><!---->4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<!----></span><br>5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<span class="line"><!---->5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<!----></span><br>6. Is this a new feature?<span class="line"><!---->6. Is this a new feature?<!----></span><br>7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<span class="line"><!---->7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<!----></span><br><br>Chrome OS Only:<span class="line"><!---->Chrome OS Only:<!----></span><br>8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <span class="line"><!---->8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative?         The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7"><!---->18220bf2128ad7d6c1588ec22492d06c762154b7<!----></a><br>Author: Muyao Xu <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Muyao Xu &lt;<!----></span>muyaoxu@google.com<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/muyaoxu@google.com"><!---->muyaoxu@google.com<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Wed May 26 23:56:47 2021<span class="line"><!---->Date: Wed May 26 23:56:47 2021<!----></span><br><br>[Zenith] Delete dummy notifications after the web page is closed<span class="line"><!---->[Zenith] Delete dummy notifications after the web page is closed<!----></span><br><br>A dummy notification should be removed from the Zenith dialog when the<span class="line"><!---->A dummy notification should be removed from the Zenith dialog when the<!----></span><br>web page that's associated with the notification is closed or lost<span class="line"><!---->web page that's associated with the notification is closed or lost<!----></span><br>focus. This matches what Cast dialog is doing.<span class="line"><!---->focus. This matches what Cast dialog is doing.<!----></span><br><br>This CL makes the PresentationRequestNotificationProducer own an<span class="line"><!---->This CL makes the PresentationRequestNotificationProducer own an<!----></span><br>observer to the WebContents, which hides the dummy notification when<span class="line"><!---->observer to the WebContents, which hides the dummy notification when<!----></span><br>the WebContents is destroyed or lost focus.<span class="line"><!---->the WebContents is destroyed or lost focus.<!----></span><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit <!----></span>8f7f373eae000caeafabe17ceee433469b291767<a class="undefined" target="_blank"         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

           issue<h3 class="medium-heading"><!----> issue</h3>
          
            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }
      <style>
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.

          position: relative;

          padding: 0;

        for LitElement.

            </select>

          </div>

              Discard
            </chops-button>

        </form>
      </chops-dialog>

 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
<script type="text/javascript" nonce="">
 runOnLoad(function() {

 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");

 }

 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
